name: Dr. Devika Irny
about: Dr. Devika Irny is an eminent practicing psychiatrist with 5+ years of experience. He is a consultant psychiatrist at the Peroor Super Speciality Hospital & specializes in de-addiction, sexology, sleep disorders, depression, anxiety, OCD, and marital problems. He has a multitude of research papers published under his name on geriatric psychiatry.

name: Dr. Harshita Murai
expertise: Play and Art therapy for kids
about: Dr. Harshita Murai is a skilled therapist with a passion for psychology and helping others. She believes in having a friendly relationship with her clients and solving issues as a team. She also equips her clients to be self-sufficient in resolving their issues through coping strategies so that they can have an optimistic view of the world around them.With years of experience working with individuals in need of mental health support, she has developed a keen understanding of the intricacies of the human mind and the ways in which it can be positively impacted through therapy.

name: Dr. Ritam Dubey
about: Ritam has more than a decade of experience in the field of mental health and counseling. He has a humanitarian approach towards handling psycho-social issues. He has worked in rehabilitation and academic settings. Ritam therapeutic style is an eclectic mix of cognitive and mindfulness based techniques. He is a passionate psychotherapist whose academic credentials Positive Psychology, Behavioural Neuroscience, Career Coaching & Psychological First Aid training.

name: Dr. Ujwal sangawar
about: Dr. Ujwal is a Counselling Psychologist, a certified Psychological Counsellor, Life Skills Trainer, and a Transactional Analysis (TA) Practitioner. He is also a Parenting Expert, Storyteller and Educator in the field of Social-Emotional Development. He integrates different modalities like TA, CBT, Storytelling, Life Skills and Psychotherapy in her work with children, adolescents, adults, corporate professionals, women groups, parents, teachers, etc. Ujwal is associated with various NGOs, Schools, Colleges, Corporates as a Counsellor, Leadership Coach, Life Skills Trainer, Therapist and Storyteller. He also spends time mentoring and coaching amateur trainers and counsellors.

name: Dr. V S Ananthakrishnan
expertise: Play and Art therapy for kids
about: The strong desire to bring a positive change in somebody's life and spread smiles motivated Charmi to pursue her career in psychology. Being in this field and empowering her clients is so magical and serene that it encouraged her to achieve the self she is today. She has extensive experience as a mental health counselor working with children, adolescents, parents, young adults, and the adult population. She provides a non-judgmental, safe space, rooted in empathy and compassion.

name: Dr. Niharika Kamath
about: Dr. Niharika core belief is to provide a safe space to the client where they can express, address and manage their challenges, directing towards their mental health well-being. She has an extensive experience of working with clients of various age groups, community, gender, sexuality, and race. She provides a non-judgmental, empathetic and compassionate space to all her clients; and works with clients in inclusive therapeutic approach.
